title: Pixel 5 & Pixel Stand - Screen Off When Dark Setting
content:
HI all,

I received my Pixel 5 on launch date yesterday and it's fantastic. I upgraded form the Pixel 3XL which I've always charged overnight on my Pixel Stand.

I found last night that I was being woken by the room being half illuminated by the clock screen (The black screen with just clock and notification icons).

I have set up the pixel stand with the pixel 5 to set 'Screen off when dark' but it seems the sensor or camera isn't picking up when it's dark? When I placed my finger directly over the camera area of the screen it would turn the screen off.....at a bit of a loss as to what to do?
